text: Great news for New Yorkers with #lupus or #RA on #hydroxychloroquine or #chloroquine. Kudos to @NYGovCuomo and @HealthNYGov Commissioner Zucker for clarifying we may receive up to a 90-day supply. Share https://t.co/LNpeiKqEg1 with your doctors and pharmacists. @SenatorParker https://t.co/IZXosnBmAw
